sqlMap.select: SELECT SoluProductName, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),SalePrice),0) AS SalePrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),MemPrice),0) AS MemPrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),MinSalePrice),0) AS MinSalePrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),MaxSalePrice),0) AS MaxSalePrice FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPriceSolutionDetail PPSD WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_ProductPriceSolutionID = #productPriceSolutionID# AND BIN_ProductID = #productId#

SELECT A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, A.CategorySAP AS cateSAP, A.UnitCode AS unitCode, PV.BarCode AS barCode, A.NameTotal AS nameCN, A.NameShort AS stNameCN, A.NameAlias AS nameAlias, A.NameForeign AS nameEN, A.NameShortForeign AS stNameEN, A.StyleCode AS styleCode, A.OperationStyle AS optStyle, A.SaleUnit AS saleUnit, A.DiscontinueCounter AS disCounter, A.DiscontinueReseller AS disReseller, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),A.StandardCost),0) AS standardCost, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),A.OrderPrice),0) AS orderPrice, A.LackFlag AS lackFlag, A.IsBOMCompatible AS isBOM, A.IsReplenish AS isReplenish, A.Status AS status, A.Mode AS mode, A.StarProduct AS starProduct, A.ShelfLife AS shelfLife, A.RecommendedNumDay AS recNumDay, A.SellStartDate AS sellStartDate, A.SellEndDate AS sellEndDate, A.ValidFlag AS validFlag, convert(varchar(30),A.UpdateTime,121) AS prtUpdateTime, A.ModifyCount AS prtModifyCount, A.ModuleCode AS moduleCode, A.IsExchanged AS isExchanged, A.Spec AS spec, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),A.MinSalePrice),0) AS minSalePrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),A.MaxSalePrice),0) AS maxSalePrice, A.SaleStyle AS saleStyle, CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),A.ExchangeRelation) AS exchangeRelation, A.IsStock AS isStock, A.ItemType AS itemType, A.OriginalBrand AS originalBrand, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),PP.SalePrice),0) AS SalePrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),PP.MemPrice),0) AS MemPrice FROM Basis.BIN_Product A JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor PV ON PV.BIN_ProductID = A.BIN_ProductID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductPrice PP ON A.BIN_ProductID = PP.BIN_ProductID AND PP.Type = '2' WHERE A.BIN_ProductID = #productId#

SELECT BIN_ProductVendorID AS prtVendorId, BarCode AS barCode, ValidFlag AS validFlag FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId#
ValidFlag = #validFlag#
ORDER BY ValidFlag DESC , BIN_ProductVendorID

SELECT A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId, B.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID AS propId, C.TeminalFlag AS teminalFlag
,B.PropValueForeign AS propValName ,C.PropertyNameForeign AS propName
,B.PropValueChinese AS propValName ,C.PropertyNameChinese AS propName
,B.PropValueChinese AS propValName ,C.PropertyNameChinese AS propName
FROM ( SELECT PrtCatePropValueBigID AS BIN_PrtCatPropValueID, BIN_ProductID FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPriceSolutionDetail WHERE BIN_ProductPriceSolutionID = #productPriceSolutionID# AND BIN_ProductID = #productId# UNION ALL SELECT PrtCatePropValueMediumID AS BIN_PrtCatPropValueID, BIN_ProductID FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPriceSolutionDetail WHERE BIN_ProductPriceSolutionID = #productPriceSolutionID# AND BIN_ProductID = #productId# UNION ALL SELECT PrtCatePropValueSmallID AS BIN_PrtCatPropValueID, BIN_ProductID FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPriceSolutionDetail WHERE BIN_ProductPriceSolutionID = #productPriceSolutionID# AND BIN_ProductID = #productId# ) A JOIN Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue B ON(A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID = B.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty C ON(B.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = C.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') ORDER BY C.ViewSeq

SELECT A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AS propValId, B.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID AS propId, C.TeminalFlag AS teminalFlag
,B.PropValueForeign AS propValName ,C.PropertyNameForeign AS propName
,B.PropValueChinese AS propValName ,C.PropertyNameChinese AS propName
,B.PropValueChinese AS propValName ,C.PropertyNameChinese AS propName
FROM Basis.BIN_PrtCategory A JOIN Basis.BIN_PrtCatPropValue B ON(A.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID = B.BIN_PrtCatPropValueID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Basis.BIN_PrtCatProperty C ON(B.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID = C.BIN_PrtCatPropertyID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE A.BIN_ProductID = #productId# ORDER BY C.ViewSeq

SELECT BIN_ProductPriceID AS prtPriceId, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),SalePrice),0) AS salePrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),MemPrice),0) AS memPrice, StartDate AS startDate, EndDate AS endDate FROM Basis.BIN_ProductPrice WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# AND Type = '2' ORDER BY StartDate
SELECT ImageShowNameChinese AS nameCN, ImageShowNameForeign AS nameEN, ImageFullPath AS path FROM Basis.BIN_ProductImage WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId#

SELECT A.Quantity AS bomQuantity, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),A.Price),0) AS bomPrice, B.BarCode AS barCode, B.BIN_ProductVendorID AS subPrtVendorId, C.UnitCode AS unitCode, C.NameTotal AS nameCN, C.NameForeign AS nameEN FROM Basis.BIN_ProductBOM A JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor B ON(A.SUB_BIN_ProductVendorID = B.BIN_ProductVendorID) JOIN Basis.BIN_Product C ON(B.BIN_ProductID = C.BIN_ProductID) JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor D ON(A.BOM_BIN_ProductVendorID = D.BIN_ProductVendorID AND D.ValidFlag = '1' AND D.BIN_ProductID = #productId#)

SELECT Pbc.BIN_ProductVendorID AS prtVendorId, Pbc.OldUnitCode AS oldUnitCode, Pbc.UnitCode AS unitCode, Pbc.OldBarCode AS oldBarCode, Pbc.BarCode AS barCode, convert(varchar(30),Pbc.UpdateTime,120) AS updateTime FROM Basis.BIN_PrtBarCode Pbc WHERE Pbc.BIN_ProductVendorID = #prtVendorId# ORDER BY Pbc.BIN_ProductVendorID,Pbc.BIN_PrtBarCodeID
SELECT BIN_ProductVendorID AS prtVendorId, BarCode AS barCode, ValidFlag AS validFlag FROM Basis.BIN_ProductVendor WHERE BIN_ProductID = #productId# ORDER BY ValidFlag DESC , BIN_ProductVendorID
